Namespaces

namespace  ISISDLM

Defines

#define IsisDlmRoutines_h

Define Documentation

#define IsisDlmRoutines_h
 

Contains the declarations of all routines in this DLM This file will declare two routines for each DLM routine available in to the IDL calling evironment.

The first routine is the initialization routine. This routine should declared using the IsisDlmInit typedef. Here is an example of the declaration of the isis_close_init routine: 

     extern int isis_close_init(IDL::IdlDlm &idl);

The second declaration is the IDL DLM routine itself. This should use the IdlRtnDef definition for its prototype: 

     extern int isis_close(const IDL::IdlRtnDef &rtn, 
                           const IDL::IdlParameters &input, 
                           IDL::IdlParameters &output);

This allows for the implemention of the routine to be completely contained in a single implementation file.

Kris Becker, USGS, Flagstaff, Arizona
